A mixture of 30 liters of paint is $25\%$ red tint, $30\%$ yellow tint, and $45\%$ water.  Five liters of yellow tint are added to the original mixture.  What is the percent of yellow tint that is the mixture?\\
$\textbf{(A)}\ 25 \qquad
\textbf{(B)}\ 35 \qquad
\textbf{(C)}\ 40\qquad
\textbf{(D)}\ 45 \qquad
\textbf{(E)}\ 50$
